synopsis.text: Sangmin's life takes a dramatic turn when he encounters the captivating Sita during his medical volunteer work in Nepal. Once revered as a living goddess, Sita has now been abandoned by society. Despite the tragic circumstances, the two fall deeply in love and marry, only to have their happiness shattered when Sita dies a year later. Desperate to reclaim his lost love, Sangmin pleads with the gods and is granted his wish, but at a cost. He finds himself back in Nepal, his body inexplicably aged, and facing a young Sita who doesn't remember him. As Sangmin navigates this unexpected twist of fate, he becomes determined to change Sita's tragic destiny in "For the Sake of Sita," a poignant tale of love, sacrifice, and the lengths one will go to protect their beloved.
